name: Gallagher Website Design
author: Gallagher Website Design

sections.description:
This plugin provides how-to videos on editing your website, as well as a number of features to websites developed by Gallagher Website Design.

For more information about this plugin you can checkout our web page at Gallagher Website Design.
sections.installation:
The following will guide you through installing and setting up this plugin.

  1. Install the plugin by either by uploading it via FTP, or by adding using the “Add Plugin” link when logged into WordPress as an admin.
  2. Activate the plugin via the Plugin page when logged into WordPress as an admin.
  3. Open up the settings page for the plugn. This can be found in the left hand menu titled “Gallagher Website Design”
  4. Enter in your Client API Key. If you don’t have one, leave this blank.
  5. If you would like to remove Project post types, check the checkbox for that.
  6. If you would like to remove Image titles from displaying for Divi, check the checkbox for that.
  7. Click the “Save Changes” button.
  8. Click on the “Tutorials” link in the left hand column to view the how-to videos.
  9. You’re all set!
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin offers several features for websites developed with the Divi theme. It also provides how-to video on editing your website if it was developed with the Divi theme by Gallagher Website Design.

How do I displable Project post types?

To display Project post types go to the Settings page for this plugin and then check the checkbox to Disable Projects Post Type. Then click the Save Changes button.

How do I remove image titles from Divi image modules on my site?

To remove image titles from Divi image modules go to the Settings page for this plugin and then check the checkbox to Remove Image Titles for Divi Image Modules. Then click the Save Changes button.

Who is Gallagher Website Design

Gallagher Website Design is an agency based website designer and developer that focuses on building websites, plugins, and e-commerce solutions for businesses that want to grow. As a full service advertising and marketing agency, they also provide Internet marketing service, marketing consultant services, and graphic designer services. They are based out of St. Peterburg, FL and services clients from the Tampa Bay area and all over the globe. Gallagher Website Design can be contacted at the following address.

Gallagher Website Design
430 3rd Ave S Unit #318
St. Petersburg, FL 33701
(727) 386-9329
